pli-tv-pvr16:2.4: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:3.4: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:4.2: Catuvīsatiyā ākārehi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na dhovanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na cīvaravicāraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na chedanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na bandhanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaṭṭiyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kaṇḍusakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na daḷhīkammakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na anuvātakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na paribhaṇḍakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na ovaddheyyakaraṇamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kambalamaddanamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na nimittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na parikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na kukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na sannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na nissaggiyena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na akappakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra uttarāsaṅgena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, na aññatra puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, sammā ce atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, tañce nissīmaṭṭho anumodati.
pli-tv-pvr16:5.9: Imehi catuvīsatiyā ākārehi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:6.3: Ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, ahatakappena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pilotikāya atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pāpaṇikena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, aparikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, akukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, asannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, anissaggiyena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, kappakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, uttarāsaṅgena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, sammā ce atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, tañce sīmaṭṭho anumodati, evampi atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:6.4: Imehi sattarasahi ākārehi atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:7.1: Saha kathinassa atthārā kati dhammā jāyanti?
pli-tv-pvr16:7.2: Saha kathinassa atthārā pannarasa dhammā jāyanti—
pli-tv-pvr16:7.4: Saha kathinassa atthārā ime pannarasa dhammā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr16:8.1: Payogassa katame dhammā anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo?
pli-tv-pvr16:8.7: vatthussa katame dhammā anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo?
pli-tv-pvr16:9.1: Pubbakaraṇaṃ payogassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.5: Paccuddhāro pubbakaraṇassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.9: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddhārassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.13: Atthāro adhiṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.17: Mātikā ca palibodhā ca atthārassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.19: Mātikā ca palibodhā ca atthārassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.21: Āsā ca anāsā ca vatthussa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.23: Āsā ca anāsā ca vatthussa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
pli-tv-pvr16:10.1: Pubbakaraṇaṃ kiṃnidānaṃ, kiṃsamudayaṃ, kiṃjātikaṃ, kiṃpabhavaṃ, kiṃsambhāraṃ, kiṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.2: Paccuddhāro kiṃnidāno, kiṃsamudayo, kiṃjātiko, kiṃpabhavo, kiṃsambhāro, kiṃsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.3: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ kiṃnidānaṃ, kiṃsamudayaṃ, kiṃjātikaṃ, kiṃpabhavaṃ, kiṃsambhāraṃ, kiṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.4: Atthāro kiṃnidāno, kiṃsamudayo, kiṃjātiko, kiṃpabhavo, kiṃsambhāro, kiṃsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.5: Mātikā ca palibodhā ca kiṃnidānā, kiṃsamudayā, kiṃjātikā, kiṃpabhavā, kiṃsambhārā kiṃsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.6: Āsā ca anāsā ca kiṃnidānā, kiṃsamudayā, kiṃjātikā, kiṃpabhavā, kiṃsambhārā, kiṃsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr16:11.1: Pubbakaraṇaṃ payoganidānaṃ, payogasamudayaṃ, payogajātikaṃ, payogapabhavaṃ, payogasambhāraṃ, payogasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.2: Paccuddhāro pubbakaraṇanidāno, pubbakaraṇasamudayo, pubbakaraṇajātiko, pubbakaraṇapabhavo, pubbakaraṇasambhāro, pubbakaraṇasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.3: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddhāranidānaṃ, paccuddhārasamudayaṃ, paccuddhārajātikaṃ, paccuddhārapabhavaṃ, paccuddhārasambhāraṃ, paccuddhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.4: Atthāro adhiṭṭhānanidāno, adhiṭṭhānasamudayo, adhiṭṭhānajātiko, adhiṭṭhānapabhavo, adhiṭṭhānasambhāro, adhiṭṭhānasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.5: Mātikā ca palibodhā ca atthāranidānā, atthārasamudayā, atthārajātikā, atthārapabhavā, atthārasambhārā, atthārasamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.6: Āsā ca anāsā ca vatthunidānā, vatthusamudayā, vatthujātikā, vatthupabhavā, vatthusambhārā, vatthusamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr16:12.1: Payogo kiṃnidāno, kiṃsamudayo, kiṃjātiko, kiṃpabhavo, kiṃsambhāro, kiṃsamuṭṭhāno, pubbakaraṇaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-pvr16:12.7: āsā ca anāsā ca kiṃnidānā, kiṃsamudayā, kiṃjātikā, kiṃpabhavā, kiṃsambhārā, kiṃsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr16:13.1: Payogo hetunidāno, hetusamudayo, hetujātiko, hetupabhavo, hetusambhāro, hetusamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr16:13.8: āsā ca anāsā ca hetunidānā, hetusamudayā, hetujātikā, hetupabhavā, hetusambhārā, hetusamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr16:14.1: Payogo kiṃnidāno, kiṃsamudayo, kiṃjātiko, kiṃpabhavo, kiṃsambhāro, kiṃsamuṭṭhāno?
pli-tv-pvr16:14.8: āsā ca anāsā ca kiṃnidānā, kiṃsamudayā, kiṃjātikā, kiṃpabhavā, kiṃsambhārā, kiṃsamuṭṭhānā?
pli-tv-pvr16:15.1: Payogo paccayanidāno, paccayasamudayo, paccayajātiko, paccayapabhavo, paccayasambhāro, paccayasamuṭṭhāno.
pli-tv-pvr16:15.8: āsā ca anāsā ca paccayanidānā, paccayasamudayā, paccayajātikā, paccayapabhavā, paccayasambhārā, paccayasamuṭṭhānā.
pli-tv-pvr16:16.3: Dhovanena, vicāraṇena, chedanena, bandhanena, sibbanena, rajanena, kappakaraṇena—
pli-tv-pvr16:20.1: Kathinassa kati mūlāni, kati vatthūni, kati bhūmiyo?
pli-tv-pvr16:20.6: khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅgaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:21.1: Kathinassa ko ādi, kiṃ majjhe, kiṃ pariyosānaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:21.2: Kathinassa pubbakaraṇaṃ ādi, kriyā majjhe, atthāro pariyosānaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.1: Katihaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo abhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.2: Katihaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.3: Aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo abhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.4: Aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.5: Katamehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo abhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.6: Pubbakaraṇaṃ na jānāti, paccuddhāraṃ na jānāti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na jānāti, atthāraṃ na jānāti, mātikaṃ na jānāti, palibodhaṃ na jānāti, uddhāraṃ na jānāti, ānisaṃsaṃ na jānāti—
pli-tv-pvr16:22.7: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo abhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.8: Katamehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.9: Pubbakaraṇaṃ jānāti, paccuddhāraṃ jānāti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, atthāraṃ jānāti, mātikaṃ jānāti, palibodhaṃ jānāti, uddhāraṃ jānāti, ānisaṃsaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-pvr16:22.10: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.5: Katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ kathinatthārā na ruhanti?
pli-tv-pvr16:23.6: Nissīmaṭṭho anumodati, anumodento na vācaṃ bhindati, vācaṃ bhindanto na paraṃ viññāpeti—
pli-tv-pvr16:23.7: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ kathinatthārā na ruhanti.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.9: Sīmaṭṭho anumodati, anumodento vācaṃ bhindati, vācaṃ bhindanto paraṃ viññāpeti—
pli-tv-pvr16:25.1: Kathinaṃ jānitabbaṃ, kathinatthāro jānitabbo, kathinassa atthāramāso jānitabbo, kathinassa atthāravipatti jānitabbā, kathinassa atthārasampatti jānitabbā, nimittakammaṃ jānitabbaṃ, parikathā jānitabbā, kukkukataṃ jānitabbaṃ, sannidhi jānitabbā, nissaggiyaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:26.2: tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo yadidaṃ kathinanti.
pli-tv-pvr16:30.2: nimittaṃ karoti iminā dussena kathinaṃ attharissāmīti.
pli-tv-pvr16:31.2: parikathaṃ karoti imāya parikathāya kathinadussaṃ nibbattessāmīti.
pli-tv-pvr16:35.2: sace saṃghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, saṃghena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, atthārakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, anumodakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.1: Saṃghena ñattidutiyena kammena kathinatthārakassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ, tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā tadaheva dhovitvā vimajjitvā vicāretvā chinditvā sibbetvā rajitvā kappaṃ katvā kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.2: Sace saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇikā saṅghāṭi paccuddharitabbā, navā saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhātabbā.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.3: Imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmīti vācā bhinditabbā.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.4: Sace uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako uttarāsaṅgo paccuddharitabbo, navo uttarāsaṅgo adhiṭṭhātabbo.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.5: Iminā uttarāsaṅgena kathinaṃ attharāmīti vācā bhinditabbā.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.6: Sace antaravāsakena kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇako antaravāsako paccuddharitabbo, navo antaravāsako adhiṭṭhātabbo.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.7: Iminā antaravāsakena kathinaṃ attharāmīti vācā bhinditabbā.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.8: Tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.9: “atthataṃ, bhante, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodathā”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.10: Tehi anumodakehi bhikkhūhi ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.11: “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāmā”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.12: Tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.13: “atthataṃ, bhante, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodathā”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.14: Tehi anumodakehi bhikkhūhi ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.15: “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro anumodāmā”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.16: Tena kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.17: “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāhī”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.18: Tena anumodakena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-pvr16:36.19: “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṃghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāmī”ti.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.1: Saṃgho kathinaṃ attharati, gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharatīti?
pli-tv-pvr16:37.2: Na saṃgho kathinaṃ attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharatīti.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.3: Hañci na saṃgho kathinaṃ attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharati.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.4: Saṃghassa anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, gaṇassa anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, puggalassa atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.5: Saṃgho pātimokkhaṃ uddisati gaṇo pātimokkhaṃ uddisati puggalo pātimokkhaṃ uddisatīti?
pli-tv-pvr16:37.6: Na saṃgho pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, na gaṇo pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, puggalo pātimokkhaṃ uddisatīti.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.7: Hañci na saṃgho pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, na gaṇo pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, puggalo pātimokkhaṃ uddisati.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.8: Saṃghassa anuddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ, gaṇassa anuddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ, puggalassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.9: Saṃghassa sāmaggiyā gaṇassa sāmaggiyā puggalassa uddesā saṃghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ, gaṇassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ, puggalassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti pātimokkhaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.10: Evameva na saṃgho kathinaṃ attharati, na gaṇo kathinaṃ attharati, puggalo kathinaṃ attharati.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.11: Saṃghassa anumodanāya gaṇassa anumodanāya puggalassa atthārā saṃghassa atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, gaṇassa atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, puggalassa atthataṃ hoti kathinanti.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.3: Kati kathinuddhārā neva saṃghādhīnā na puggalādhīnā?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.8: Cattāro kathinuddhārā neva saṃghādhīnā na puggalādhīnā—
pli-tv-pvr16:54.12: Kati kathinuddhārā siyā antosīmāya uddhariyyanti siyā bahisīmāya uddhariyyanti?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.17: Cattāro kathinuddhārā siyā antosīmāya uddhariyyanti siyā bahisīmāya uddhariyyanti—
